conclusion: A is entering from the right side of the image, moving towards the left.
A blue cube is directly in the path of A.
A yellow cube is slightly above and to the left of the blue cube.
A red cube is further to the left and slightly above the yellow cube.
A blue marble is near the bottom center.
A green cube is at the top left.
A will likely collide with the blue cube first, as it is directly in its path.
After hitting the blue cube, A may be deflected slightly upwards or downwards, depending on the angle of impact.
If deflected upwards, A might hit the yellow cube.
If deflected downwards, A might continue towards the blue marble.
A will eventually stop after colliding with one or more objects, depending on the force and direction after each collision.
A is likely to come to rest near the blue cube or the yellow cube, depending on the deflection angle and remaining momentum after the first collision.
